name: Rhythm Wizard (RhythmWizards)
description:
Created by Bryan Morris & Brandon Jamison-Frankola.

Go head to head and battle to the beat in this fast paced rhythm game where you play as a wizard ready to unleash magical mayhem on your out-of-tune opponent.  The player with the higher score wins, but watch out; you never know what a wizard has up his sleeve!

** Requires Guitar Hero Live Controllers **
